nodes.text: Kindin was a male Mon Calamari bounty hunter who worked with Xo'ru. The two of them accepted Rogun the Butcher's bounty on a smuggler during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Around 3643 BBY, during the time of the civil war on Ord Mantell, Kindin and Xo'ru were sent by Rogun to capture and bring back the Smuggler known as Ace for believing him to have stolen a shipment of weapons which was supposed to be delivered to him.

When Ace arrived at the docking bay in Drelliad village, Kindin and Xo'ru confronted him. Unwilling to convince Ace to come with them, the two along with Ace and Corso Riggs got into a fight which both Kindin and Xo'ru were killed.
